root.name: Midway Arcade Treasures: Extended Play
root.description: Midway Arcade Treasures: Extended Play is a collection of arcade games from Midway 's back catalogue. These games were ported to the Sony PSP, adding wireless multiplayer functionality to games which could support it.The single player games included are:- Spy Hunter Sinistar Defender Paperboy 720 Those with the addition of wireless multiplayer are:- KLAX Joust Marble Madness Toobin' Rampage Gauntlet Rampart Wizard of Wor Xybots Championship Sprint Arch Rivals Cyberball 2072 Xenophobe Mortal Kombat Mortal Kombat II Mortal Kombat III The developer was Digital Eclipse.
